about.title: African Innovation,
about.description1: DULU Sarl was born from the vision of transforming the African digital landscape. Based in Douala, our company combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of local needs to deliver innovative digital solutions.
about.description2: Our mission is to propel African businesses into the digital future by providing cutting-edge tools and services tailored to their specific needs.

features.messageDesc: Writing impactful messages, optimized to captivate the target audience and make the offer irresistible.
features.titleDesc: Creation of catchy and engaging titles, adapted to the campaign objective.
features.imageDesc: Development or selection of creative and striking visuals, reinforcing the message.
features.targetingDesc: Precise settings to effectively reach the right audience (age, gender, interests, geolocation, etc.).
features.campaignDesc: Launch of ads with all necessary technical settings.
features.budgetDesc: Daily monitoring and strategic adjustments to maximize ROI.
features.reportDesc: Complete performance analysis: ROI, CPC, CTR, conversions, etc.
features.phoneAdviceDesc: Practical advice for effectively converting generated leads.

features.autoResponsesDesc: Intelligent system that responds instantly to your customers' messages 24/7.
features.customMessagesDesc: Responses adapted according to the type of request and customer profile.
features.fastProcessingDesc: Efficient handling of customer requests with instant and relevant responses.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale (TCS)
cgv.intro: These Terms and Conditions of Sale (TCS) define the rights and obligations of DULU Sarl and its clients in the context of online sales of products or services via this website and associated platforms, including Facebook. Any order placed implies full and unconditional acceptance of these TCS.

legalInfo.title: 1. Legal Information about the Company
legalInfo.address: Full Address: Rue Mandessi Bell Bali-Douala
legalInfo.returnAddress: Return Address: Rue Mandessi Bell Bali-Douala

products.title: 2. Offered Products and Services
products.description: Products: A Meta ads service and other social media advertising services, as well as a client response automation service for entrepreneurs, business owners, or executives.
products.usage: Intended Use: These services help users increase their sales and free themselves from repetitive tasks.

process.title: Ordering Process
steps: Select the desired products and add them to your cart.
Confirm your order by following the indicated steps.
You will receive a confirmation email once the order is validated.

validation.title: Validation
validation.description: An order is considered final after:
conditions: Receipt of an email confirming the order has been processed.
validation.note: Note: Orders placed through third-party platforms, such as Facebook or Instagram, are subject to the usage policies of those platforms in addition to these TCS.

pricing.title: 4. Pricing and Billing
items: Prices: Prices are displayed in Euros and include applicable taxes.
Additional Fees: Any delivery charges or specific taxes will be clearly indicated before confirming the order.
Billing: An invoice will be sent to the email address provided during the order process.
pricing.note: Note: Prices are subject to change, but changes will not affect orders already confirmed.

methods.title: Accepted Payment Methods
list: Other integrated payment platforms (depending on availability).

security.title: Payment Security
security.description: Transactions are secured through PayPal. No banking data is retained by DULU Sarl.

delivery.title: 6. Delivery and Associated Fees
items: Timeframe: The service is available immediately upon order confirmation.
Covered Regions: Africa, Europe, and North America.
Delivery Fees: None, as these are services.

withdrawal.title: 7. Right of Withdrawal and Returns
items: Withdrawal Period: You have 15 days from the start of service execution to exercise your right of withdrawal.
Conditions: The service must not have been initiated by DULU Sarl.
Procedure: Contact us at gaston.effa@gmail.com to formalize your withdrawal request.

guarantees.title: 8. Guarantees and Liability
items: Conformity: Services conform to the description provided at the time of ordering.
Liability Limit: DULU Sarl cannot be held responsible for delays caused by external factors or improper use of its services.

dataProtection.title: 9. Data Protection and Cookies
items: Personal Data: Your data is collected and used in accordance with our Privacy Policy for order processing.
Cookies: The site uses cookies to optimize the user experience.
GDPR Compliance: You may request the modification or deletion of your data at any time via gaston.effa@gmail.com.

disputes.title: 10. Disputes and Competent Jurisdictions
disputes.description: In case of a dispute, an amicable solution will be prioritized. If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Douala, Cameroon.

facebook.title: Specific Mentions for Facebook
facebook.description: DULU Sarl complies with Facebook's commercial policies. Any interaction via Facebook Shop is also subject to the platform's rules. In case of conflict between these TCS and Facebook's rules, the latter will prevail for orders placed on the platform.
